title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.18 - Daily examination of records of employment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.18 - Daily examination of records of employment

State Regulations
A member of the staff designated by the chair, shall
make examination daily of the records of employment of the pari-mutuel
employees, and he or she shall make daily written report to the commission with
respect to compliance or otherwise with section 249 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel

Wagering and Breeding Law having to do with the citizenship and place of
residence of such employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
